title: Fuel Pump Assembly - Removal

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Observe the warning advice given in the General Information section on the safe handling of fuel and fuel containers.
A fire, causing personal injury and damage to property could result from spilled fuel or fuel not handled or stored correctly.
The fuel pump and fuel filter is a sealed for life unit and must be replaced as a complete assembly.
Using proprietary professional automotive workshop equipment approved for fuel handling, drain the fuel from the fuel tank.
Invert the fuel tank and place on a protective surface to prevent paint damage.
Remove the fixings securing the fuel pump mounting plate to the fuel tank.
Lift the fuel pump assembly and manoeuvre it from the fuel tank aperture.
Disconnect the fuel level sensor electrical connector and remove the fuel pump and filter assembly.

body.name: Fuel Pump and Filter Assembly - Removal cegz

body.body: Noting its orientation, remove and discard the sealing ring from the fuel pump assembly.

Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Observe the warning advice given in the General Information section on the safe handling of fuel and fuel containers.
A fire, causing personal injury and damage to property could result from spilled fuel or fuel not handled or stored correctly.
The fuel pump and fuel filter is a sealed for life unit and must be replaced as a complete assembly.
Perform the following operations:
Using proprietary professional automotive workshop equipment approved for fuel handling, drain the fuel from the fuel tank.
Fuel Tank - Removal
Invert the fuel tank and place on a protective surface to prevent paint damage.
Remove the fixings securing the fuel pump mounting plate to the fuel tank.
Mounting plate
Fixings
Lift the fuel pump assembly and manoeuvre it from the fuel tank aperture.
Disconnect the fuel level sensor electrical connector and remove the fuel pump and filter assembly.
Fuel level sensor electrical connector
Noting its orientation, remove and discard the sealing ring from the fuel pump assembly.
